_source.short_desc: Gym member management software with payment processing, Integrated Websites, virtual training, scheduling, automations & more.
_source.long_desc: Our comprehensive, gym member management software provides everything you need to turn your passion into a successful business. With payment processing & auto-billing, lead-generating  websites + digital marketing, virtual classes, scheduling, retail, automations, Member & Staff Apps, in-depth reporting & more, you have everything required to grow, nurture & retain your members.
_source.pricing_details:
15-day free trial, no credit card required.

Up to 50 members: $117/month-to-month
Up to 100 members: $157/month-to-month
Up to 250 members: $197/month-to-month
More than 250 members: $227/month-to-month
_source.target_audience: Fitness business owners who want to spend their time doing what they love & sharing their passion, rather than sitting behind a desk handling the administrative work required with running a business.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Boost staff efficiency, delight members, and crush revenue goals with Zenoti, the complete software solution for fitness businesses.
related_products.features: Streamline operations, boost staff efficiency, and delight members with Zenoti, the complete fitness software solution. Easy-to-use, innovative features powered by artificial intelligence automate and simplify gym and studio business management, from new member acquisition to billing collections. More than 20,000 wellness businesses worldwide trust Zenoti to help them scale. On average, clients experience double-digit increases in customer retention, staff retention, and revenue growth.

related_products.short_desc: Manage class scheduling and registration, billing and payments, communications, and reporting all from one convenient software online.
related_products.features: Developed by school owners, for school owners, iClassPro is the worlds best online class management software solution for class-based businesses. A subscription to iClassPro includes features for class and camp schedule, enrollment tracking, communications, accounts receivable, online registration, reporting and more. iClassPro has an amazing support team is available to help every step of the way.

related_products.short_desc: The complete boutique gym management software: Manage gym memberships, class schedules, check-ins & payments from one intuitive system.
related_products.features: Specifically designed for gym owners! Our gym management software is built by fitness professionals, for fitness professionals. This boutique gym software is an all-in-one system - from scheduling classes to processing payments - with a branded mobile app and website integrations. Increase sales and retain more members with marketing integrations to Facebook, Mailchimp and many more. Give your members the best experience by reducing admin tasks while increasing revenue.

related_products.short_desc: TeamUp is a better value management software for business owners that takes away the complexity of running your gym, box, or studio.
related_products.features: TeamUp is software for ambitious business owners that does things differently. Take away the complexity of running your gym, box, or studio with easier-to-use and better value management software. Keep your classes full and bring all the best parts of your business together in one place. Easily manage all your gym/studio customers' data all-in-one tool, streamline your admin and marketing activities, optimise your sales processes and stand out from competitors with the best client experience.

related_products.short_desc: GymMaster is a powerful club management solution with full functionality on any device, 24/7 access, and a web portal for your members.
related_products.features: GymMaster is designed for health clubs - a pleasure to use and quick to learn. Manage your club from anywhere on any device with auto billing, automated personalized communication, and an advanced 24 hour access control system that gives you ultimate control. Increase sales and go paperless by letting your members sign up online. And once they're a member, they can book & pay online through you own branded member portal on your website. See what GymMaster can do for you today, book a free demo!

related_products.short_desc: Bring your Martial Arts community together with Kicksite to motivate your members and simplify your business.
related_products.features: Software for Martial Arts schools looking for a user-friendly solution to end complicated student management. We serve over 2,000 schools with our easy to navigate, web-based software. We meet all Martial Arts school's unique needs, like attendance tracking, belt rank promotion, automated tuition collection, video library, lead capture forms and integrated website services. Whether you are just opening up your business or own multiple locations, Kicksite is the perfect all-in-one solution.

related_products.short_desc: EZFacility's all-in-one management software will centralize and streamline your health, fitness, or sports facility's operations!
related_products.features: EZFacility's gym and health club management software will centralize and streamline your facility's operations. Manage rentals, leagues, registration, events, invoicing, payments, and more. EZ's secure, state-of-the-art, responsive, and intuitive web-based solution is the perfect fit for any fitness or sports facility. Whether you simply reserve courts & fields---or manage memberships, camps, clinics, leagues, special events, & more, EZFacility is your all-in-one facility management software!

related_products.short_desc: Sign up in less than 1 minute and start growing your gym with modern gym management software.
related_products.features:
Sign up in less than 1 minute and start growing your gym with modern gym management software.

By combining a smooth, modern and intuitive experience with a rich portfolio of advanced features, Gymdesk truly takes the weight off your shoulders when it comes to managing your fitness club. Attendance tracking, booking, scheduling, billing, PoS & Marketing - you will have everything you need at hand. You & your team will notice the difference from day 1. Try 30 days for free!

related_products.short_desc: Used by organizations to manage their memberships, integrate their other SaaS platforms, & automate their critical tasks.
related_products.features: Join It is a membership management service that enables organizations to effectively keep track, manage, and grow their community. At our core, we provide a simple database and dashboard interface for organization leaders to monitor developments in their membership. We then integrate this database context with best in class service providers to automate other essential components of an organization, like payment processing, email communication, and event organization.

similar_products.short_desc: Wellyx is Award-Winning Fitness and Wellness software helps your business grow with intuitive, simple and feature-rich tools.
similar_products.features: Wellyx is the world-leading Business Management Software for the Wellness and Fitness Industries. You can expand your business by making well-informed decisions. Membership Management, Point-of-Sale, Access Control Systems, Marketing Automation, Live Streaming, and Online Classes are all available to businesses in the fitness industry, from gyms to health clubs to yoga studios. Available on the cloud, from any device & from anywhere.

similar_products.short_desc: Increase performance, centralize tasks, and connect with members with ABC IGNITE, the industry's leading club management software.
similar_products.features:
ABC Fitness Solutions is the premier software solution partner for the fitness industry with over 40 years of proven industry knowledge. ABC's next generation gym management solution, IGNITE, is technology for the people who move fitness forward.

The flexible, scalable and intuitive solution addresses all the jobs to be done in a club. Deploying IGNITE as an integrated suite gives gym owners and operators complete control of their businesses and improves member lifetime value.

similar_products.short_desc: Comprehensive easy-to-use fitness center management software.
similar_products.features:
Run your gym with Insight! 

Built from the ground up by gym owners, Gym Insight is a comprehensive software system designed to make your fitness business more profitable. Memberships, personal training, class scheduling, SMS, access management, and even point of sale are made simple and easy, saving time for members, employees, trainers, and managers.  

Customizable dashboards and comprehensive reports let you track a multitude of stats including account payment status, monthly dues, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one gym software with everything you need to run your gym effectively. We Build Fitness Communities.
similar_products.features:
Get ready to streamline your fitness business with a connected system. Triib's all-in-one gym management platform empowers you with a connected desktop platform, self-service kiosk & point-of-sale, and both android and iOS mobile apps, all at one flat rate.

We've built everything under the hood to optimize your day-to-day, saving you time & effort. Get all the tools you need with the best customer success team in the industry. Ensure your success with Triib.

similar_products.short_desc: The Fitness Growth Platform: Your one-stop-shop gym software to convert leads and enhance member communication and engagement.
similar_products.features:
Fit Pro Tracker is the Fitness Growth Platform for business owners. 

Our one-stop-shop fitness software gives studio owners the ability to convert leads and enhance member communication and engagement. 

An intuitive, billing and CRM platform, inclusive of a client app for booking sessions and tracking class history. Created by gym owners, for gym owners.

You now have texting, emailing, and calling capabilities in ONE gym management software!

similar_products.short_desc: All-In-One cloud-based member/customer management software and billing for fitness clubs, yoga studios, martial arts centers and more
similar_products.features:
The cloud-based, ALL-IN-ONE iGo360, Fitness Club Management Software features include: easy member sign-up, group fitness and personal trainer scheduling, payment processing, collections, door access, employee compensation, POS sales, and much more. 

Multi-club owners can run real time consolidated and comparative reporting and track member attendance at various locations. 

All this is available anywhere you have an internet connection. Start a free trial now

similar_products.short_desc: ShapeNet management software will optimize employee productivity and maximize member engagement.
similar_products.features: ShapeNet management software will optimize employee productivity and maximize member engagement. Mobile Apps, 24/7 Door Access, Video Fitness Workouts, Auto Credit Card Updater, GAMIFICATION, Contests, Point Tracking, Texting, Paperless Agreements, Fitness Assessments, Scheduling for Classes and PT, Point of Sale, Check-in, EASY online registration, Excellent Support, 20 years experience. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Dance Studio software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Dance Studio tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Dance Studio software significantly cuts time and administrative costs of running a dance studio by automating such functions of studio management as billing, scheduling, student records maintenance, registration, credit card processing and class material printing. For related solutions see Accounting software and Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fitness software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fitness tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fitness software helps you organize your gym with client booking tools, scheduling, financial tracking, and community tools. Fitness software often includes automated billing features, point of sale, and resource reporting. Buyers looking for fitness software may also be interested in Club Management software and Personal Trainer software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Gymnastics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Gymnastics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Gymnastics software allows instructors and parents to track gymnasts' skills and scores during classes, competitions, and various events.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Personal Trainer software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Personal Trainer tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Personal Trainer software assists fitness professionals to schedule and track workout sessions for their clients, as well as collecting payments, and automating communication.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Yoga Studio software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Yoga Studio tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Yoga Studio software cuts time and administrative costs of running a yoga studio by automating such functions of studio management as billing, scheduling, student records maintenance, registration, credit card processing and class material printing. For related solutions see Club Management software, Membership Management software and Scheduling software.

related_products.short_desc: Automate your appointments, cancellations, and reminders by using the world's friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Meet the personal scheduling assistant that'll kick your martial arts studio up a belt or two! Acuity works 24/7 behind the scenes to fill your calendar and take busywork off your plate. From the moment students book with you, Acuity is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let students reschedule on their own, and process payments. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly even as business gets busier.

related_products.short_desc: Use Vagaro Martial Arts Fitness Software to get booked, process payments, send reminders and market your business. Starts at $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one martial arts fitness software to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Reach more customers via text & email marketing. Get booked on the Vagaro Marketplace and on social media. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage appointments and packages while on any device. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody software helps streamline your martial arts business; class scheduling, student management, payments, virtual classes & more.

Step up your dojo with marketing automations, scheduling, staff and student management, payment processing, automated reminders, reporting, and more. Building your brand? Get a custom app, too. Save time and give your clients the attention they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

You get a full blown website, or a booking widget if you already have a website, where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, gift cards and service add-ons. Manage your business with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments.

From class scheduling to payment processing, the Glofox software makes admin tasks hassle free. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.
